content: I don't have access to all music critics or scholars' works. however, a quick search online didn't reveal any notable comparisons between "street spirit" and "wish you were here." while both songs share similar themes, they have different compositional styles, tones, and musical influences. "wish you were here" is a classic rock anthem with a focus on acoustic guitar and a memorable guitar solo, while "street spirit" is more experimental and atmospheric, with haunting vocals, intricate guitar work, and a somber melody.
